attributes.action: STOP ANJEM CHOUDARY RECEIVING BENEFITS AND POLICE PROTECTION
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why is it as a tax payer I am paying for for someone to reside in this country that obviously poses a terrorism risk, finds it fun to insult the country that he lives in and without remorse. Why am I paying for him to do this through the Benefits Agency and also people living in his local council paying for police officers to protect him whilst doing it?
Why should I stand and the undersigned have to stand for this.

rejection.details: We do not accept petitions relating to an individual's circumstances.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
